Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.decorators

Class WinTwoFloorsFallDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.AbstractGodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.decorators.PowerGodDecorator
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.decorators.WinTwoFloorsFallDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WinTwoFloorsFallDecorator
extends PowerGodDecorator
This decorator is used to give to the player the opportunity to win if his worker moves down two or more levels in a move
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • checkConditionsToWin

      public boolean checkConditionsToWin​(GameSession gameSession)
      This method is used to check if the player has won the game. An additional case is when is worker moves down two or more levels.
      Overrides:
      checkConditionsToWin in class PowerGodDecorator
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      True if the player has won, false otherwise.

    • cleanFromEffects

      public AbstractGodCard cleanFromEffects​(java.lang.String nameOfEffect)
      This method is used to clean the card from possible decorators which could block some functionalities. It is called when the blocker begins a new turn.
      Overrides:
      cleanFromEffects in class PowerGodDecorator
      Parameters:
      nameOfEffect - The effect that the blocker has activated by doing a determined action.
      Returns:
      The card cleaned by the blocking decorator passed as parameter.
